metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000014 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4, and 4.6 are vulnerable to a DOS weakness in the tableediting functionality

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.0.10-1ubuntu0.1+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.0.10-1ubuntu0.1+esm4').
